name: Seppic - Lamellar Liquid Crystal Emulsion Technology
description: Seppic, an Air Liquide Healthcare subsidiary, offers innovative lamellar liquid crystal emulsion technology for skin barrier strengthening. Their technology creates ordered arrangements of surfactant and oil molecules at the oil-water interface, mimicking the natural structure of the stratum corneum. This lamellar organization provides superior barrier repair and moisturization benefits.
notes: Air Liquide Healthcare subsidiary with innovative emulsion technologies. Lamellar liquid crystal emulsions create ordered molecular arrangements that mimic skin structure. Superior barrier strengthening and moisturization benefits. Extensive technical expertise and global distribution.
